body: Niccolo, The error is happening for a very simple reason.  You flattened the vieFactorMesh output from the "View Factor" component and the other component rely on the data tree structure of this output in order to understand which meshes correspond to which volumes of air.  Find a working file attached. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Yh-B8VrdxHgrNQjSPlI4BrOoxqLCSMSwuqFeL7l39IBUJJcLYgPA7V93I*KvHriGA*ehEN3rP1WUHp*I9kEp-QQ5kVs5FrgN/FixedMicroclimateGHFile.JPG) -Chris
